sentences.en: A rotund, smiling, red-faced gentle-man appeared.
sentences.cn: 一位身材圆胖、面带笑容、满脸通红的先生出现了。

sentences.en: A rotund, smiling, red-faced gentleman appeared.
sentences.cn: 一位身材圆胖、面带笑容、满脸通红的先生出现了。

sentences.en: He is a pleasant rotund little man; he always looks very well - fed.
sentences.cn: 他是个可爱的矮胖子, 看上去总像是吃得很好.

sentences.en: The ambulance - men had to dhow their way through the huge crowd standing rotund the crashed ears.
sentences.cn: 救护人员只好从围观出事车辆的人群中挤进.

sentences.en: the rotund figure of Mr Stevens
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯先生圆胖的体形

words.tran_cn: 圆形物；圆胖；声音的洪亮；文体的浮夸（等于rotundness）

trans.tran_cn: 圆的，矮而胖的，洪亮的，夸张的
trans.tran_en: If someone is rotund, they are round and fat
